mood: Your mind is racing with intellectual breakthroughs, requiring you to choose integrity over impulse.
detailedPrediction: Jupiter (Guru) highlights communication and promises today. You may feel torn between two ideas, but the Libra Moon assists in arriving at balanced conclusions. Use this energy to formalize business agreements and build professional trust through ethical conduct.
generalAdvice: Mean what you say. Avoid presenting radical ideas today as the timing for being understood is not yet ideal.
